long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Collect and curate everything on a subject. Add context to each file. Pack it all up in one master link. Then email the link, share it on Slack, pass it around your team. And put an end to losing + explaining assets.
